entry.title: Most Loving
entry.summary:
Author: stilltrails

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,863Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 701

Summary: Hal Jordan was many things, but a parent was certainly not one of them. But when there's a runaway, semi-traumatized miniature assassin living in his house, he really doesn't have a choice. OrArguments were not uncommon in the Wayne Manor. Neither was the occasional radio silence from one of Bruce's kids. But this...this was different. They always came back, always called. But Damian was nowhere to be seen, nowhere to be found. Not to mention, he'd cleaned out his entire bedroom. Whether he'd intended to or not, Bruce had driven a deeper wedge between he and his son than before. And now, he'll do anything he can to fix it. Even if it means treating Hal Jordan, the one person in the world Damian seems to respect, with some form of dignity.

entry.title: Super Pride
entry.summary:
Author: sillywittlerabbit

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,102Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 44

Summary: It's Pride Month in the DC Universe, and everyone is doing something different this month. For some, they've just recently discovered this new part of themselves, and so celebrating Pride is new occurrence. For others who have known about this part of themselves for a while, celebrating Pride is just another tradition. One thing is for sure, none of these characters are celebrating Pride on their own.

entry.title: Bruce's (Alphabetical) List of Reasons Why Superman is Not as Innocent as He Pretends to Be: Number 1
entry.summary:
Author: parksy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 993Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 153

Summary: Clark: No I mean if we're playing, I'd fuck you Diana, obviously it would be a wonderful night--Diana: and all the way into the morning, obviouslyClark: Obviously. And I'd marry Batman, so sorry Hal, I guess you gotta go.Hal, outraged: Marry Bats???? Over Me???Clark: Yeah, hello, have you seen him? No offense and all, but if you get the chance to sleep with wonder woman you kinda have to. And if I marry Batman I get sweet gadgets, nerdy banter, awful coffee, and I get to use the little ears on the cowl as handles while I bend him over the breakfast table every morning.(plot twist, Clark totally knows Batman's there and this is his extremely weird and roundabout way of flirting)

entry.title: You Promised I Was Safe With You
entry.summary:
Author: Astrea_Stars

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,035Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 27

Summary: Bruce lied to protect him.He altered the mission route, thinking it would keep Hal safe — but instead, it led him straight into danger. When Hal nearly dies, the truth unravels not through confession, but in the silence, in the hesitation, in the pattern of a man who always plans three steps ahead.Hal trusted Bruce — not just with his life, but with his heart. And when the truth comes out, it’s not the trap that breaks him. It’s the betrayal.The heartbreak.The realization that Bruce didn’t trust him enough to choose his own fate.And Bruce?He thought love meant protection.He thought he could carry the burden of risk alone.But love without trust is just control in disguise.And Hal won’t stay where he isn’t trusted.

entry.title: With All Due Respect
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrapefruitSoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,163Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 229

Summary: Bruce gave a slight smile, his voice low and curiosity piqued. “You have permission to speak.” Clark shifted uncomfortably, his gaze dropping to the ground. “As someone who’s dedicated his life to your safety and happiness,” he began, his voice quiet but steady, “it matters deeply to me that you choose a partner truly worthy of you — someone who honors your love and your loyalty.” He drew in a slow breath, then lifted his eyes to meet Bruce’s. “And I’m afraid, my prince… the man you’re considering is not that person.”Or Clark is in love with Bruce, the prince he protects and Bruce is oblivious.

entry.title: To cage a star
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,120Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 717

Summary: "Excuse me, um... I need to find someone, would you- would you mind helping me?"The lady who is asked is an old woman at a bus stop, with a warm expression on her face."Yes, dear, who are you looking for?""Um..." The little girl in the pale green dress reaches for her small purse and pulls out a carefully kept piece of paper to give the old lady. "His name is written on the back...""And who may this person be to you, dear?""My dad... Mom said Mr. Bruce Wayne is my dad."

entry.title: Borderline
entry.summary:
Author: Captain_Kinky

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,283Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 381

Summary: “Bruce?” Hal dubiously asked as if questioning whether his sight betrayed him, the pep in his step immediately faltering.“Oh, you two know each other?” Carol asked, distancing herself from the handsome billionaire.“No, I’m afraid we don’t.” Bruce turned to Hal, and his words were a pointed warning. “After all, what would a billionaire and a test pilot have in common before now, hm?”“Right, right. No, uh, I just mean… Bruce Wayne. Crazy to see a billionaire here.” Hal came closer to the pair, leaning closer to the man as he managed to grit out, “Why are you here?”“Well, Mr. Jordan–”“Hal is fine.”“I was hoping to fund a new project for Ferris Air, and I’ve selected you as my test pilot.”

entry.title: someone, fill my heart and quench my thirst
entry.summary:
Author: strawberrylemontart

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,535Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 125

Summary: "I'm sure he's no stranger to people appreciating his looks.""But it's because of that, that he could be thinking Hal's intentions are underhanded or disingenuous as theirs." Dinah reminded the table, "Like you said yourself Hal, Bruce offers up a lot of himself. There are probably few things he holds close to his chest. If he thinks you're just eager to get him into bed, he's probably not going to react well to those advances. I'm just thinking out loud here, but he seems the type to want more than that."-----Hal has been trying to spend more time with Bruce and flirting with him to make their meetings to discuss investigations, feel more like dates. Miscommunication keeps them from taking a step forward with their relationship, and only after Hal gets sense knocked into him, does he have the chance of clearing things up with Bruce.
